root: ^Well hello good sir! How are you doing on this wonderful afternoon?

well: ^I'm glad to hear it. Say, that's a mighty fine rifle you've got there. Do you know how to use it?
task: ^Haha. Naturally! In that case, I'll bet a capable guy like you would be up for a challenge. I've lost a dozen of my best golden eggs, and I'm too tired to search for them with all the ghouls lurking about. If you can manage to find them and bring them all back to me, I'll give you a special reward...
task2: ^Excellent! Please be careful not to break any, they're very valuable to me. They're also quite heavy! Don't push yourself.
denied: ^What a shame. Well, have a good one!
bad: ^Well I'm sorry to hear that. I wish you the best sir!
